text: jab tum palatakar unake paas pahunchoge to ve tumhaare saamane bahaane karenge. tum kah dena, "bahaane na banao. ham tuîmhaaree baat kadaapi nahin maanenge. hamen allaah ne tumhaare vrttaant bata die hai. abhee allaah aur usaka rasool tumhaare kaam ko dekhega, phir tum usakee or lautoge, jo chhipe aur khule ka gyaan rakhata hai. phir jo kuchh tum karate rahe ho vah tumhe bata dega.
